TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_DeJuan_Blair, title = DeJuan_Blair, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/DeJuan_Blair} }

S.FORM: DeJuan Blair unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u p'agal tins' tay suruw. DeJuan Blair i 2009 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 37, namapili' tu nu San Antonio Spurs putiput. tatama, lumeniay a tademaw, nalecuhan i 4 a bulad 22 a demiad, 1989 a mihcaan, DeJuan Blair, miunduay.

DeJoan Blair ono syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, o p'agal tins' tay sorow. DeJoan Blair i 2009 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ko owac ato silsil 37, namapili' to no San Antonio Spors potipot. tatama, lomeniay a tademaw, nalecohan i 4 a bolad 22 a demiad, 1989 a mihcaan, DeJoan Blair, miondoay.
